query: SELECT id, name, uf, city, difficulty, distanceKm FROM trails WHERE name LIKE '%Piquinho%' UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) as id, 'Total trails' as name, '' as uf, '' as city, '' as difficulty, 0 as distanceKm FROM trails;
